description: The cluster ID of the pirmary IBM Spectrum Scale cluster created on IBM Cloud Satellite.
name: primary-cluster-id

description: The primary file system name created on IBM Cloud Satellite.
name: primary-fs-name

description: The FQDN or IP address of the primary GUI node on IBM Cloud Satellite Spectrum Scale cluster.
name: primary-gui-host

description: The name of secret for that contains the username and password to connect to the primary cluster GUI.
name: primary-secret-name

description: The username to connect to the primary cluster GUI.
name: primary-gui-api-user

description: The password to connect to the primary cluster GUI.
name: primary-gui-api-password

description: The cluster ID of the owning IBM Spectrum Scale cluster deployed on IBM Spectrum Fusion.

description: The FQDN or IP address of the owning GUI node on the Spectrum Scale cluster deployed on IBM Spectrum Fusion.

description: The name of secret for that contains the username and password to connect to the owning scale cluster GUI from IBM Spectrum Fusion.

description: The username to connect to the owning cluster GUI from IBM Spectrum Fusion.
name: owning-gui-api-user

description: The password to connect to the owning cluster GUI from IBM Spectrum Fusion.
name: owning-gui-api-password
